message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to sell it to you for $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12500?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $14000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $13000?

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $13250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to consider $13000 flat?

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not going to go any lower. I'll offer you the product for $13100. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13100 and my original offer of $12000. Would you consider $12550?
